vehicle.create_index_query: FT.CREATE idx:vehicles ON JSON SCHEMA $.timestamp AS timestamp NUMERIC SORTABLE $.location AS location GEO $.company_id AS company_id TEXT $.person_id AS person_id TEXT $.trip_id AS trip_id TEXT $.route_id AS route_id TEXT $.agency_id AS agency_id TEXT $.licence_plate AS licence_plate TEXT $.speed AS speed NUMERIC $.speed_accuracy AS speed_accuracy NUMERIC $.heading AS heading NUMERIC $.entity_type AS entity_type TAG $.occupancy_status AS occupancy_status TAG $.congestion_level AS congestion_level TAG

trip_update.create_index_query: FT.CREATE idx:trip_updates ON JSON SCHEMA $.timestamp AS timestamp NUMERIC SORTABLE $.company_id AS company_id TEXT $.trip_id AS trip_id TEXT $.start_time AS start_time TEXT $.start_date AS start_date TEXT $.route_id AS route_id TEXT $.agency_id AS agency_id TEXT $.entity_type AS entity_type TAG

alert.create_index_query: FT.CREATE idx:alerts ON JSON SCHEMA $.timestamp AS timestamp NUMERIC SORTABLE $.company_id AS company_id TEXT $.cause AS cause TEXT $.effect AS effect TEXT $.entity_type AS entity_type TAG
